Address.Address1: MOO 8, HAAD SALAD, KO PHANGAN, SURATTHANI 60/2

Description.Text: Located on the exquisite white sand of salad bay beautifully decorated in traditional Thai southern.The island also includes a few attractions. Or if you are feeling lazy spend the day by the three-level pool sipping cocktails and enjoying the sun. After an exciting day spent exploring the underwater world or the surrounding area, head to the Spa at the resort for a relaxing massage. Guests enjoy a quiet, upscale location when choosing to stay at the Salad Buri Resort & Spa in Koh Phangan. The hotel provides amenities like Barbecue area, Dry cleaning, Lobby, Reception and Smoke-free hotel.

Famous for its Full Moon parties, the island of Koh Phangan is also home to some luxurious resorts. Literally steps from the beach, this resort on Salad Beach lets you take full advantage of the sun, sea and sand. The island also includes a few attractions.
